title: Camera shows I'm tilted but I'm not
content:
Hi all,
I recently flashed my Pixel 3a XL using stock image and Android Flash Tool from https://developers.google.com/android/images 

Before I flashed my phone, there's nothing wrong when I took photos. But after I flashed it, I found it weird that even though I'm not tilted, the camera app says I'm tilted. If I tilt the phone, it says I'm not tilted.



And I also use the "bubble level" tool in Google search, it shows my phone is tilted even if I put it on the ground.


So far I have already tried reboot, reboot into safe mode, uninstall camera app update and reinstall the update, none of them fix the issue. I also contacted Google support and they can't fix it.

How can I get it fixed ?
